name: Getting Companies to fight for you 🤼‍♂
description: Working at our dream company- Isn't that a dream we all have ‼ Wish you could interact with Mentors from the Industry, who've been there, accomplished their goals and are doing what they love ❓GTech μLearn presents Mentor Connect 👨🏽‍🏫, an original initiative as part of Weekly Twitch. Occurring every Friday at 7pm, this initiative will give members an opportunity to interact, learn, and explore their interests with mentors from the Industry.Join us on 25th November for the first edition of Mentor Connect with Mr. Aravind Panicker (@arvind_s_panicker), Application Engineer at Google.
